venue.name: Cambridge Innovation Center - 5th Floor Training Room

item.description:
Boston Marketing Learning Group Meeting -
LinkedIn for Business Tutorial and Workshop by Dave Gowel of Clearly Creative


Bring your wifi-enabled laptops so you can not only learn how to use LinkedIn's professional networking tool for business, but you will use that knowledge immediately in a collaborative workshop setting. This session is intended to satisfy all those individuals who say "I have a LinkedIn profile, but I'm not sure how to use it for business.

This tutorial and workshop will cover the following topics:
  • Protecting your privacy and security
  • Enhancing your personal and company LinkedIn profiles
  • Growing your LinkedIn Network
  • Lead generation through LinkedIn
  • Business tools on LinkedIn
  • How to use LinkedIn Daily



Dave Gowel is the President and CEO of Clearly Creative, a Cambridge-based marketing firm that provides online and traditional marketing services to clients in various vertical industries, nationwide. LinkedIn has granted Clearly Creative use of their brand to promote the networking giant's tool in events such as this one.

RSVP for this FREE MEETING!
item.how_to_find_us: (In building public parking (closes at 10pm), MIT / Kendall Red Line T-stop 50 m
item.name: LinkedIn for Business Tutorial and Workshop by Dave Gowel of Clearly Creative
